lemma iteratei_abs_rule_insert_P: assumes pre : "I {} \<sigma>0" "\<And>S \<sigma> x. \<lbrakk> c \<sigma>; invar x; \<alpha> x \<in> S0 - S; I S \<sigma>; S \<subseteq> S0; \<forall>y\<in>(S0 - S) - {\<alpha> x}. R (\<alpha> x) y; \<forall>y\<in>S. R y (\<alpha> x)\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> I (insert (\<alpha> x) S) (f x \<sigma>)" "\<And>\<sigma>. I S0 \<sigma> \<Longrightarrow> P \<sigma>" "\<And>\<sigma> S. \<lbrakk> S \<subseteq> S0; S \<noteq> S0; \<not> c \<sigma>; I S \<sigma>; \<forall>x\<in>S0-S. \<forall>y\<in>S. R y x \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> P \<sigma>" shows "P (iti c f \<sigma>0)"
